text: 这里有两种方式可以使用这本手册。
你可以手持并右击打开这本书（
或者把这本书放在书立上（
如果你把书放在书立上，能够直接访问这本书。
你可以直接点击这些连接访问对应书页。
右击书页左侧可以向前翻页。
右击书页右侧可以向后翻页。
右击书页顶部能够回到封面。
在书页里，你可以用方向键左，右，退格，空格和home键来翻页。
Shift右击书能够从书立上取下书。
is a mod that tries to bring more immersion to the Minecraft world.
It tries to avoid GUI's as much as possible and instead allows you to interact with machines directly by
placing and removing items in handles.
should be intuitive. In most cases you rightclick with the right item on a specific handle
and if it is the right item it should fit in. If there is already an item there you can remove it.
The first thing you might have noticed when looking around you is the rocks (
Sticks are more likely to be found under trees and rocks you can usually find everywhere
These items are very useful. Gather as many as you can.
Rocks can be thrown by right clicking them. This can be useful as an early game
You can also place them back on the ground or use them for various crafting recipes
) on a rock on the ground will create flint and steel (
Sticks can be found in bundles. You can place sticks back in the world by right clicking them.
Breaking leaves is another way to gather sticks.
With sticks you can easily make fire.
Either place the sticks on the ground in a bundle and use a flint and steel (
Or else place a rock on the floor and right click it with a stick.
You may have to do this a number of times before it works.
A burning bundle of sticks will slowly use up the sticks.
By right clicking new sticks you can make sure it keeps burning
) on the ground and right click it with a rock (
Any item can be placed on a wall or on a block if you want.
This can be a faster way to access your tools or weapons.
You can basically just pick them from the wall directly.
For tools this happens automatically if you right click them on a solid block
(provided this feature is enabled in the config).
Otherwise you can use the 'p' key (default placement key) to place an item on the block you want.
Note that you can fit 4 items on a single block surface.
ImmersiveCraft has various blocks that you can use. All of them allow you to use them without having to access a GUI.
The bookstand can hold a single manual (provided it supports this mod) and allows you to read it in-world.
Just right click the book on the stand and sneak-right click to remove it again.
This is a more immersive chest that can hold 12 stacks.
You can open and close it and place items in it
This furnace works like a regular furnace. The only difference is that you need to ignite the fuel using flint and steel (
A shelf can hold 16 items. It works a bit like a chest except that it is wall mounted and does not have a lid to close it.
A cupboard is exactly like a shelf but it can be closed.
A bookshelf can be used to hold various types of books. It has room for 27 books.
This is another mod that greatly extends the immersive features.
It adds water handling and cooking devices.
